labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The game still appears as being played.
data.expected_result: The game should stop appearing as being played.
data.short_description: Xbox game presence stays on profile even when game isn't being played.
data.steps_to_repro: - Link Discord account to Xbox account - Start playing a game, have the game show up on your profile as being played - Stop playing game
